en.stage1MissionText1: Welcome to the Robo League Raceway.
en.stage1MissionText2: Tomorrow is the biggest race event of the year.
en.stage1MissionText3: Sadly our test driver for the day has yet to show up to work.
en.stage1MissionText4: It's up to you to test drive our new vehicles.
en.stage1MissionText5: Can you please choose a vehicle to drive?
en.stage1MissionText6: For the first mission of the day, We need you to drive to the end of this course.
en.stage1MissionText7: Before you start you should know about motion.
en.stage1MissionText8: Motion is the change in the position of an object.
en.stage1MissionText9: By driving to the end of this course we use the motion of our vehicle to change our position.
en.stage1MissionText11: You can accelerate and brake with the up and down arrows or the W and S keys. Use the left and right arrows, or the A and D keys to steer.
en.stage1MissionText12: We will catch up more at the end of the course.
en.stage1MissionText14: It's important to know that the energy of motion we use to drive our vehicle is a kind of mechanical energy.
en.stage1MissionText15: Let's move on. In front of you, there are 2 routes. It's up to you to choose which route to take.
en.stage1MissionText16: Each one has a solution to this problem.
en.stage1MissionText17Question: What is the change in position of an object?
en.stage1MissionText18Correct: Well done! Motion is the change in the position of an object.
en.stage1MissionText19: Carry on to the finish line.
en.stage1MissionText21Incorrect2: If you can't remember any information, there is a help panel on the side of the screen you can open with the mouse/touchpad.
en.stage1MissionText22: Excellent work. That's the first course tested.
en.stage1MissionText23: Let's move on to race track 2.
en.stage2MissionText1ChooseCar: Can you please choose a vehicle to drive?
en.stage2MissionText2: Before we get testing the course, we need to talk about energy.
en.stage2MissionText4: The energy of motion is called kinetic energy.
en.stage2MissionText5: Oh no, I've just been informed that someone has left a pile of boxes on one of the 2 courses in front of us. But we don't know which course.
en.stage2MissionText6: You'll need to build up energy through the motion of the vehicle to knock down the pile of boxes.
en.stage2MissionText7: Beware there are objects on the track that will slow you down. You'll need to be going at least 25 mph to successfully clear the boxes from the course.
en.stage2MissionText8: Can you solve this problem and choose a course to drive?
en.stage2MissionText10Correct: Well done, the kinetic energy we built up through the motion of our vehicle has been transferred into the boxes and cleared them from the course.
en.stage2MissionText11Wrong: Hmm, it's, not on this course. Try again.
